document.full_text: russian president dmitry medvedev could shed more light on whether he or prime minister vladimir putin will run in the 2012 presidential election wednesday, when he holds his biggest news conference since taking office.
document.title: dmitry medvedev could shed light on russian election plans
lines_and_colors: russian president dmitry medvedev could shed more light on whether he or prime minister vladimir putin will run in the 2012 presidential election wednesday, when he holds his biggest news conference since taking office.
